name: Neon Racer (itch) (chpoud)
description:
Drive at high speed through a futuristic neon city and perform extraordinary stunts to climb to the top of the leaderboard!

* Controller required to play.

CREDITS

Programmers : Charles Poulin, Edward Healy, Mathieu Brodeur-Béliveau, Samuel Crosilla 

2D Artist : Tatiana Titov
3D Artists : Rémi Perreault, Bouchera Tahraoui 

Game Designer : Jean-Philippe Filiatrault 

Sound Designer : Vincent Laplante
